divs: Sighting Details9:47PM at end of event. My first ever report probably nothing. Too Lazy to ceck space station orbit. A very bright single light. Spoted it half way across sky and watched it till at end of horizon and 'almost' invisable due to slight cloud cover. No navigation red and blue. Single light, very high. Exactly as a satilite but 10 times brighter. Could see the light as it passed over some light clouds and it was not fully dark out yet. 20 years working aircraft commercial and military.
Summary: Bright light from west to east 9:47PM
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Clearfield
There were no other sightings in Clearfield on or around June 19th 2006
